Classes in org.hypergraphdb.peer used by org.hypergraphdb.peer

HyperGraphPeer
          Main class for the local peer.
MessageHandler
           
NetworkPeerPresenceListener
           A listener that tracks low-level network peer activity - to be invoked when a peer joins/leaves the network before its HyperGraphDB identity has be established/validates/authenticated.
PeerFilter
           
PeerFilterEvaluator
           
PeerInterface
          This interface is implemented by classes that handle incoming and outgoing message traffic for the peer.
PeerPresenceListener
           A listener that tracks when peers, whose HyperGraphDB identity has been established, join/leave the network.
PeerRelatedActivity
           A callable object that executes a task against a given peer with a boolean result indicating success or failure.
PeerRelatedActivityFactory
           
Performative
           The FIPA standard communicative acts.
PerformativeConstant
           
PrivatePeerIdentity
           This is a simple data structure that represents a HyperGraphDB peer identity.
